extDesc.message: Adds possibility to download tracks from TracksFlow.

downloadButtonTitle.description: Text in 'title' attribute of download button

playlistPlayWarn.message: You need to start playing any track from this list to begin download. This will be fixed in next versions
playlistPlayWarn.description: Shown at the top of the window in case you can't download track

noLinkWarn.message: Can't get track download link. Track is played from YouTube, Deezer or other service that doesn't provide link
noLinkWarn.description: Shown at the top of the window in case of service doesn't provide download link
